name: FailTape
description:
A game made for the Abertay Game Dev Societies 2022 Freshers Game Jam, with the theme "it's okay to fail".

This is a simple platforming puzzle game inspired by the VHS, where you move blocks and avoid hazards to get to the end. If you hit a hazard or make a mistake, that's okay! The game will pause and you can rewind as far back as you'd like, just like a VHS tape!

Controls are:

WASD/Arrows to move

Space to jump

P to pause the game 

Left arrow to rewind, Right arrow to fast forward when the game is paused.

Yellow blocks are pushable, blocks of static are hazards. Watch out for the scan lines too!

VHS SFX: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/vhs/

CRT Shader: https://luka712.github.io/2018/07/21/CRT-effect-Shadertoy-Unity/

Jump SFX made with JFXR

Audio trimmer: https://audiotrimmer.com/#  

Main theme edited using:  https://voicechanger.io/
